member.name: T:ResumeApi.Controllers.AdminController
member.summary: Admin endpoints for user and system monitoring.

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.AdminController.Metrics
member.summary: Simple activity metrics (totals, last 24h and 7d resumes).

member.name: T:ResumeApi.Controllers.AuthController
member.summary: Authentication endpoints for registering and logging in.

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.AuthController.Login(ResumeApi.Controllers.AuthController.LoginDto)
member.summary: Login with email and password to receive a JWT.

member.name: T:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController
member.summary: Manage resumes: create, update, list, download PDF, and get AI suggestions.

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.List(System.Boolean)
member.summary: List resumes for the current user; Admin can pass all=1 to list all.

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a resume by id (owner or Admin only).

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.Create(ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.ResumeDto)
member.summary: Create a new resume for the current user.

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.Update(System.Int32,ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.ResumeDto)
member.summary: Update a resume (owner or Admin only).

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a resume (owner or Admin only).

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.Download(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Download a resume as a formatted PDF (owner or Admin only).

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.AiSuggestions(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate and persist AI suggestions for the resume.

member.name: M:ResumeApi.Controllers.ResumesController.AiSuggestionsPreview(System.Int32)
member.summary: Preview AI suggestions without saving them.
